   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    var googletag = googletag || {};
 googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];
 googletag.slots = googletag.slots || {};
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    var utmGoogleTag = {
       getCookie: function(name) {
           var nameEQ = name + "=";
           var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
           for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
               var c = ca[i];
               while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
               if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
           }
           return null;
       },
       setCookie: function(name, value, days) {
         var expires;
         if (days) {
           var date = new Date();
           date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
           expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
         } else {
           expires = "";
         }
         document.cookie = name + "=" + value + expires + "; path=/";
       },
       getQuery: function(variable) {
          var query = window.location.search.substring(1);
          var vars = query.split('&');
 
          for (var i=0;i<vars.length;i++) {
            var pair = vars[i].split('=');
            if(pair[0] == variable){ return pair[1]; }
           }
 
          return null;
       },
       utmNames: {},
       utmNamesCount: 0,
       init: function(utms) {
         if (!window.btoa) { return; }
 
         for (var i = 0; i < utms.length; i++) {
           this.utmNamesCount++;
           var query = this.getQuery(utms[i]);
 
           if(query || document.cookie.indexOf(utms[i] + "=") < 0) {
             if (query) {
               query = window.btoa(query);
               this.setCookie(utms[i], query);
               this.utmNames[utms[i]] = query.toString();
             }
           } else {
             this.utmNames[utms[i]] = this.getCookie(utms[i]);
           }
         }
       }
     }
 
     utmGoogleTag.init(["utm_medium", "utm_campaign", "utm_source"]);
 
     googletag.cmd.push(function() {
       if (utmGoogleTag && utmGoogleTag.utmNames && utmGoogleTag.utmNamesCount > 0) {
         googletag.pubads().setTargeting("campaign", "yes");
         for (var key in utmGoogleTag.utmNames) {
           if (utmGoogleTag.utmNames[key] !== "false") {
             googletag.pubads().setTargeting(key, utmGoogleTag.utmNames[key]);
           }
         }
       }
     });
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    googletag.cmd.push(function() {
 googletag.slots["out_of_page"] = googletag.defineOutOfPageSlot("/359/itpro.co.uk", "dfp-ad-out_of_page")
   .addService(googletag.pubads())
   .setTargeting("position", "1")});
   </script>

 googletag.slots["dfpnative1"] = googletag.defineSlot("/359/itpro.co.uk", [270, 150], "dfp-ad-dfpnative1")
   .addService(googletag.pubads())
   .setTargeting("position", "1")
   .setTargeting("native", "homepage")});
   </script>

 googletag.slots["mpu_1"] = googletag.defineSlot("/359/itpro.co.uk", [[300, 250], [300, 600]], "dfp-ad-mpu_1")
   .addService(googletag.pubads())
   .setTargeting("position", "1")});
   </script>

   <script type="text/javascript">
    googletag.cmd.push(function() {
         googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', function(e) {
           if (e.size[0] === 1 && e.size[1] === 1) {
             // Define the value of the ad slot
             var slotDfpID = e.slot.getSlotElementId();
             // Append -wrapper to match it to a Div
             slotDfpID += '-wrapper';
             // Hide that div
             document.getElementById(slotDfpID).style.display = 'none';
 
             return;
           }
 
           var slugParent  = e.slot.getSlotElementId();
           var slug        = document.getElementById(slugParent).querySelector('.slug');
 
           slug.style.display = 'block';
 
           if (e.size[0] >= 1000) {
             slug.style.width = '100%';
             slug.style.paddingRight = '10px';
           } else {
             slug.style.width = e.size[0] + 'px';
           }
        });
     });
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    (function($) {
   typeof $ && typeof $.fn.on !== "function" && $.fn.extend({
     on: function(event, callback, fallback) {
       switch (typeof callback) {
         case "function": return this.live(event, callback);
         case "string"  : return $(callback).live(event, fallback);
       }
     }
   });
 }(jQuery));
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i["GoogleAnalyticsObject"]=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){(i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)})(window,document,"script","//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js","ga");ga("create", "UA-1011119-1", {"cookieDomain":"auto","allowLinker":true});ga("require", "linkid", "linkid.js");ga("require", "displayfeatures");ga("require", "linker");ga("linker:autoLink", ["itpro.co.uk","    dennis.slgnt.eu"]);ga("set", "dimension1", "|");ga("set", "dimension2", "0");ga("set", "dimension14", "|");ga("set", "dimension15", "Homepage");ga("set", "dimension19", (function(){if(document.querySelector){var c=document.querySelector('link[rel=canonical]');if(typeof c !== 'undefined'){return c.href;}}})());
             
             function ved_decode(ved) {
                 // Copyright 2013 Deed Poll Office Ltd, UK <https://deedpolloffice.com>
                 // Licensed under Apache Licence v2.0 <http://apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0>
                 var keys = { t: 2, r: 6, s: 7, i: 1 }, ret = {}, re, match;
                 if (ved.match(/^1/)) {
                     re = /([a-z]+):([0-9]+)/ig;
                     while ((match = re.exec(ved)) !== null)
                         ret[keys[match[1]] || match[1]] = parseInt(match[2], 10);
                     return ret;
                 }
                 ved = ved.replace(/_/, '+').replace('-', '/');
                 ved = window.atob((ved + "===").slice(1, ved.length + 3 - (ved.length + 2) % 4));
                 re  = /([\x80-\xff]*[\x00-\x7f])([\x80-\xff]*[\x00-\x7f])/g;
                 while ((match = re.exec(ved)) !== null)
                     ret[varint_decode(match[1]) >> 3] = varint_decode(match[2]);
                 return ret;
                 function varint_decode(vint) {
                     var ret = 0, i = 0;
                     for (; i < vint.length; ++i) ret += (vint.charCodeAt(i) & 0x7f) << (i * 7);
                     return ret;
                 }
             }
             
             var str = document.referrer;
             matches = document.referrer.match(/[\/.]google\..*[?&]ved=[a-zA-Z0-9_:,-]{32}([a-zA-Z0-9_:,-]+)(&|$)/);
             if ((typeof(matches) !== 'undefined') && (matches !== null)) {
                 matches3 = JSON.stringify(ved_decode(matches[1]));
                 matches2 = matches3.match(/(\d+)[^\d]+:8[,}]/);
                 if ((typeof(matches2) !== 'undefined') && (matches2 !== null)) {
                     switch (matches2[1]) {
                         case '2':
                             ga("set", "dimension20", "web search");
                             break; 
                         case '37':
                             ga("set", "dimension20", "news onebox");
                             break; 
                         case '257':
                             ga("set", "dimension20", "sitelink");
                             break; 
                         case '38':
                             ga("set", "dimension20", "video");
                             break; 
                         default: 
                             ga("set", "dimension20", matches2[1]);}
                     } else {
                     ga("set", "dimension20", "ved-error");}
             }ga("send", "pageview");ga('create', 'UA-84606622-1', 'auto', 'b2bTracker');ga('b2bTracker.send', 'pageview');

            <a href="http://www.alphr.com/" rel="nofollow" style="padding: 8px 2px 2px 2px;margin: 8px 0px 0px 0px;border-width: 1px 0px 0px 0px;border-color:#ffffff;border-style:solid">
             Alphr
            </a>
           </li>
           <li class="leaf">
            <a href="http://www.cloudpro.co.uk/" rel="nofollow">
             Cloud Pro
            </a>
           </li>
           <li class="last leaf">
            <a href="http://www.channelpro.co.uk/" rel="nofollow">
             Channel Pro
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
         </li>
        </ul>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="block block-search" id="block-search-form">
       <div class="content">
        <form accept-charset="UTF-8" action="/" class="form-search form-search-block" id="search-block-form" method="post">
         <div>
          <div class="container-inline">
           <div class="form-item form-type-textfield form-item-search-block-form">
            <label class="element-invisible" for="edit-search-block-form--2">
             Search
            </label>

           </div>
           <div class="form-actions form-wrapper" id="edit-actions">
            <button class="form-search-submit form-submit" id="edit-submit" name="op" type="submit" value="&lt;span&gt;Search&lt;/span&gt;">
             <span>
              Search
             </span>
            </button>
           </div>
           <input name="form_build_id" type="hidden" value="form-MM-5q3i_3esfVYsl_KUYiHuc3tjhG7Ri6nlAZp_gND0"/>

          </div>
         </div>
        </form>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

    <div class="region region-preface-top preface-top" id="preface-top">
     <div class="block block-dfp" id="block-dfp-billboard">
      <div class="content">
       <div class="dfp-tag-wrapper" id="dfp-ad-billboard-wrapper">
        <div class="dfp-tag-wrapper" id="dfp-ad-billboard">
         <div class="slug">
          Advertisement
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          googletag.cmd.push(function() {
       googletag.display("dfp-ad-billboard");
     });

         <div class="view view-top-boxes-homepage view-id-top_boxes_homepage view-display-id-block_1 view-dom-id-0976ca8d93076bac1d6d3de25a6c4bd3">
          <div class="view-content">
           <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last top-box clearfix">
            <div class="views-field views-field-field-teaser-image">

               </a>

             <h5>
              <span>

               </a>
              </span>
             </h5>
             <div class="content">
              <div class="teaser-image">
               <a href="/security/31550/russia-accused-of-trying-to-hack-us-senator">

              </div>
              <span class="field field-name-field-article-type field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden">
               <span class="field-item even">
                <a datatype="" href="/news" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel" typeof="skos:Concept">

                </a>
               </span>

              <div class="field field-name-field-published-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden">

           <div class="views-row views-row-20 views-row-even clearfix">
            <div class="node node-review node-promoted even node-index-pages-teaser">
             <h5>
              <span>
               <a href="/laptops/31577/lg-gram-review-a-lightweight-15in-laptop-with-plenty-of-oomph">
                LG Gram review: A lightweight 15in laptop with plenty of oomph
               </a>
              </span>
             </h5>
             <div class="content">
              <div class="teaser-image">
               <a href="/laptops/31577/lg-gram-review-a-lightweight-15in-laptop-with-plenty-of-oomph">
                <img src="http://cdn2.itpro.co.uk/sites/itpro/files/styles/index_thumb_200x113/public/2018/07/lg_gram_look.jpg?itok=8R8KZCIw" typeof="foaf:Image"/>
               </a>
              </div>
              <span class="field field-name-field-article-type field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden">
               <span class="field-item even">
                <a datatype="" href="/reviews" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel" typeof="skos:Concept">
                 Reviews
                </a>
               </span>
              </span>
              <div class="field field-name-field-published-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden">
               <div class="field-items">
                <div class="field-item even">
                 <span class="date-display-single" content="2018-07-25T17:31:00+01:00" datatype="xsd:dateTime" property="v:dtreviewed">
                  25 Jul, 2018
                 </span>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <span class="field field-name-field-author field-type-node-reference field-label-hidden">
               <span class="field-item even">
                <a href="/authors/nathan-spendelow">
                 Nathan Spendelow
                </a>
               </span>
              </span>
              <p class="short-teaser">
               The lightest 15in laptop we’ve ever tested, and the longest-lasting too
              </p>
              <div class="field field-name-field-review-score-overall field-type-fivestar field-label-hidden">
               <div class="field-items">
                <div class="field-item even">
                 <div class="clearfix fivestar-average-stars">
                  <div class="fivestar-static-form-item">
                   <div class="form-item form-type-item">
                    <div class="fivestar-default">
                     <div class="fivestar-widget-static fivestar-widget-static-vote fivestar-widget-static-5 clearfix">
                      <div class="star star-1 star-odd star-first">
                       <span class="on">
                        5
                       </span>
                      </div>
                      <div class="star star-2 star-even">
                       <span class="on">
                       </span>
                      </div>
                      <div class="star star-3 star-odd">
                       <span class="on">
                       </span>
                      </div>
                      <div class="star star-4 star-even">
                       <span class="on">
                       </span>
                      </div>
                      <div class="star star-5 star-odd star-last">
                       <span class="on">
                       </span>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="description">
                     <div class="fivestar-summary fivestar-summary-">
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>

            <div class="node node-review node-promoted odd node-index-pages-teaser">
             <h5>
              <span>
               <a href="/mobile/30409/android-vs-ios-which-mobile-os-is-right-for-you">
                Android vs iOS: which mobile OS is right for you?
               </a>
              </span>
             </h5>
             <div class="content">
              <div class="teaser-image">
               <a href="/mobile/30409/android-vs-ios-which-mobile-os-is-right-for-you">
                <img src="http://cdn2.itpro.co.uk/sites/itpro/files/styles/index_thumb_200x113/public/2018/01/android_vs_ios.jpg?itok=YClydrKP" typeof="foaf:Image"/>
               </a>
              </div>
              <span class="field field-name-field-article-type field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden">
               <span class="field-item even">
                <a datatype="" href="/vs" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel" typeof="skos:Concept">
                 Vs
                </a>
               </span>
              </span>
              <div class="field field-name-field-published-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden">
               <div class="field-items">
                <div class="field-item even">
                 <span class="date-display-single" content="2018-07-25T07:21:00+01:00" datatype="xsd:dateTime" property="v:dtreviewed">
                  25 Jul, 2018
                 </span>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <span class="field field-name-field-author field-type-node-reference field-label-hidden">
               <span class="field-item even">
                <a href="/authors/clare-hopping">
                 Clare Hopping
                </a>
               </span>
               <span class="field-item odd">
                <a href="/authors/it-pro">
                 IT Pro
                </a>
               </span>
              </span>
              <p class="short-teaser">
               We look at design, security, compatibility and more to see which OS best fits your business
              </p>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="views-row views-row-34 views-row-even clearfix">

               <span>
                <a href="/security/31386/gdpr-doesnt-just-apply-to-digital-data">
                 GDPR doesn't just apply to digital data
                </a>
               </span>
              </h5>
              <div class="content">
               <div class="field field-name-field-category-primary field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden">
                <div class="field-items">
                 <div class="field-item even">
                  <a datatype="" href="/security" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel" typeof="skos:Concept">
                   Security
                  </a>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </li>
            <li class="last odd">
             <div class="node node-article node-promoted odd node-popular">
              <h5 class="title">
               <span>
                <a href="/enterprise-resource-planning-erp/31579/homeland-security-warns-businesses-of-oracle-and-sap-erp">
                 Homeland Security warns businesses of Oracle and SAP ERP vulnerabilities
                </a>
               </span>
              </h5>
              <div class="content">
               <div class="field field-name-field-category-primary field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden">
                <div class="field-items">
                 <div class="field-item even">
                  <a datatype="" href="/enterprise-resource-planning-erp" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel" typeof="skos:Concept">
                   enterprise resource planning (ERP)
                  </a>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="block block-dfp" id="block-dfp-dfpnative3">
        <div class="content">
         <div class="dfp-tag-wrapper" id="dfp-ad-dfpnative3-wrapper">
          <div class="dfp-tag-wrapper" id="dfp-ad-dfpnative3">
           <script type="text/javascript">
            googletag.cmd.push(function() {
       googletag.display("dfp-ad-dfpnative3");
     });
           </script>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </aside>
    </div>
    <!-- /#main -->
   </div>
   <!-- /#page -->
